By the time the explosion cleared Necromancer was as close to the entrance =
of the Cybertronian fire as he could get. He set Razor Claw down and turned=
 back to where he had left Mobster, He was the only bot left that was big e=
nough to fight the Gestault and have a chance of winning. He saw Mobster in=
 the distance, he looked something like the Coyote after a failed attempt t=
o catch the roadrunner. He was to far away to hear the taunting from the gi=
ant. The great dragon shrunk down, transforming to bot mode, he was still o=
ne of the larger bots on the battlefield but at least now he had a chance t=
o blend in. He raised his weapon and fired a ice blast at Mobster, it looke=
d like the only way to fight this battle would be for a dragonto use gueril=
la tactics.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: SOULSTICE 
  To: nbwrpg=
@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, December 29, 2000 1:32 AM
  Subject: Re: Sorr=
y soulstice


  Mobster is burnt massively by the fireball. He still was st=
anding.

  Mobster: I think you are...scared...of me...
    ----- Original =
Message ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: =
Friday, December 29, 2000 7:00 AM
    Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


    Ne=
cromancer picks up Razor Claw, "You've seen enough action for today." He tr=
ansforms back to his dragon form to carry the raptor away from the battle o=
nly to be struck in the back by mobsters shots. "Looks like the only way ou=
t of this is through him." 

    Necromancer flies into the air carrying Ra=
zorclaw in one of his claws. He launches a white fireball at Mobster, follo=
wed by a blue one. the blue catches up and causes the white one to explode =
in a brilliance of blinding light and searing heat. (Little chemistry note-=
 White and Blue are two of the hottest in the laws of Physics.)
      -----=
 Original Message ----- 
      From: SOULSTICE 
      To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
      Sent: Thursday, December 28, 2000 7:02 PM
      Subject: Re: Sorry=
 soulstice


      Mobster is charred some, but still doesn't move. He aims=
 at Razorclaw.

      Mobster (multiple voices): Doomsday.

      Mobster f=
ires 3 times at Razorclaw...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        =
From: CYBERWOLF4 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Tuesday, De=
cember 26, 2000 8:36 AM
        Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


        The =
blast hit Razor Claws shield, it saved him from the power of the blast but =
he'd taxxed it to it's limits. he fell to the ground again spent from the p=
hysical exhertion he'd put on himself. He picked himself up again insisting=
 on being destroyed on his feet. Fireballs hit Mobster causing Razor Claw t=
o look back. Necromancer had arrived in time to save him.

        Necroman=
cer saw that he had Mobsters full attention when the giant fired on him. He=
 transformed to robot mode shrinking down to a smaller target to dodge the =
blast. he rased his rifle and set it on high power. he fired five blasts at=
 the head of Mobster as he flew down to check the condition of the Raptor h=
e'd just saved.
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: SOU=
LSTICE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Monday, December =
25, 2000 10:33 PM
          Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


          Mobste=
r fired again at Razorclaw...
            ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
         From: CYBERWOLF4 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            =
Sent: Monday, December 25, 2000 4:01 AM
            Subject: Re: Sorry soul=
stice


            Razor Claw raised to his feat to stubborn to know when =
to quit. he stepped forward, ready for anything the larger bot had to offer=
. "You ready to surrender yet?" He asked sarcastically even though he alrea=
dy knew the answer.
              ----- Original Message ----- 
           =
   From: SOULSTICE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sen=
t: Sunday, December 24, 2000 9:34 PM
              Subject: Re: Sorry souls=
tice


              Mobster watched, wondering how Razorclaw felt...and en=
joying the thought. Mobster, as cruel as the Mini-Mafia could be, waited fo=
r Razorclaw to regain his strength and composure, he wanted to knock it out=
 of Razorclaw again...
                ----- Original Message ----- 
      =
          From: CYBERWOLF4 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
       =
         Sent: Monday, December 25, 2000 3:16 AM
                Subject: R=
e: Sorry soulstice


                Razor Claw bounced off Mobster, the im=
pact made his head spin. The mighty raptor heard Mobster have some smart as=
s comment toward him. He looked up in time to see Mobster raise his weapon =
again. Razor Claw turned and tried to run and got just far enough to avoid =
being hit directly by the beam. The weapon still had a devastating effect o=
n him though as the shrapnel of dirt and pebbles shred at his skin. The bla=
st shot him about sixty yards from where he'd started. He landed with an oo=
of as his body skipped multiple times across the hard African ground. There=
 he lay in pain, trying to regain his strength and composure.
             =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: SOULSTICE 
     =
             To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Sunday, Decemb=
er 24, 2000 1:53 PM
                  Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


      =
            Mobster wobbled some, but that was the extent of it. He turned =
around.

                  Mobster (Grenade voice): Are you trying to knock=
 me over, little man?

                  Mobster fires at Razorclaw once...=

                    ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From=
: CYBERWOLF4 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                 =
   Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 7:54 PM
                    Subject: Re:=
 Sorry soulstice


                    A sudden shadow covered Razor Claw a=
s Mobsters foot raised above him. "Oh Pit" he yelled as he turned to run. H=
is energy was low so he didn't want to risk his shield not holding. He ran =
toward Mobster. Mobsters foot struck the ground behind Razor Claw, the impa=
ct shook the ground sending Razor claw rolling past the giant gestalt. He r=
olled to his feat and turned again ready for battle. He dove forward at Mob=
sters rear end hoping the giant would still be off balance enough to knock =
over.
                      ----- Original Message ----- 
                 =
     From: SOULSTICE 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
       =
               Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 10:46 AM
                   =
   Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                      (I normally am agai=
nst stomping, but...)
                       
                      Mobster=
 raised his foot.

                      Mobster (Kracken voice): Over!

  =
                    Mobster brung his foot down towards Razorclaw...
      =
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
                        Fro=
m: CYBERWOLF4 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            =
            Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 12:11 PM
                      =
  Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                        Razor Claw remaine=
d still as a statue, watching the battle rage around him. He opened a comm =
to anyone listening. "Razor Claw to any available maximal, I'm pinned down =
and need some coverfire."
                          ----- Original Message =
----- 
                          From: SOULSTICE 
                         =
 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                          Sent: Saturday, December=
 23, 2000 1:16 PM
                          Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


=
                          Mobster stood still. The raptor would have to mov=
e sometime.

                          Mobster (Horn Drill voice): He'll ha=
ve to move sometime. Who helped to build this house?

                     =
     Mobster kept his cannon aimed at Razorclaw, waiting and watching...
  =
                          ----- Original Message ----- 
                   =
         From: CYBERWOLF4 
                            To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
                            Sent: Saturday, December 23, 2000 12:48 PM
=
                            Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                =
            Razor Claw knew that there was only one way to survive a blast =
from a weapon of that size. he transformed to Raptor mode and used full str=
ength on his shield. The ground around him incinerated on contact. He survi=
ved but it was sapping to much of his strength. The raptor couldn't move wi=
thout deactivating his shield.
                              ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
                              From: SOULSTICE 
            =
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                              Sen=
t: Friday, December 22, 2000 10:04 AM
                              Subject=
: Re: Sorry soulstice


                              Mobster took a scratc=
h of damage, still looking down at Razorclaw. Mobster aimed his giant canno=
n at Razorclaw and fired...
                                ----- Original =
Message ----- 
                                From: CYBERWOLF4 
          =
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                             =
   Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 7:01 AM
                                =
Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                                Razor Claw s=
tood confused for the moment, he tried to show no weakness. He stepped forw=
ard and hurled his sword at Mobster. "Is this supposed to impress me?" he a=
sked looking up at the bot he challenged. 
                                =
----- Original Message ----- 
                                From: SOULSTI=
CE 
                                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
               =
                 Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:50 AM
               =
                 Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                           =
     Gigas didn't move an inch, seeing as how Mobster was in his place now.=


                                Gigas: How about this, I crush you, as Mo=
bster, I crush you, as Gigas, it'll work 2 ways.

                         =
       Mobster switches voices.

                                Kracken: B=
ut right now, we're Mobster...
                                ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
                                From: CYBERWOLF4 
       =
                         To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                          =
      Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:15 AM
                          =
      Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                                Razor =
Claw looked up at his attacker still showing no fear, "That sounds like a c=
hallenge, Let's make this interesting, you knock me down, I join your allia=
nce, I knock you down, you surrender to the Maximals, deal?" he stepped for=
ward, pulled his left arm back and threw an upprcut into Gigas' stomach. "I=
'll go first."
                                ----- Original Message -----=
 
                                From: SOULSTICE 
                        =
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                                Sent: Wedne=
sday, December 20, 2000 12:18 PM
                                Subject: R=
e: Sorry soulstice


                                Gigas: Oh, hohohohoho,=
 I love an unfair fight. That wasn't my best shot, but I didn't want to was=
te anything on you. In other words, I am not intimidated. I have seen battl=
es come and go, me taking the brunt of the attack, but i still stand, I sti=
ll walk, I still fight. You know, you should join the Alliance, it would do=
 you a world of good.

                                Gigas stayed planted=
 to his spot, not moving an inch...
                                ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
                                From: CYBERWOLF4 
  =
                              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                     =
           Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 10:20 AM
                    =
            Subject: Sorry soulstice


                                Sorr=
y, it must've been mixxed up in the battle. I found it.

                  =
              claw struck him, but Gigas didn't move. Beholder 2 and Grenad=
e are both bowled over by the energy ball. Horn Drill jumps in the air and =
backflips, happy that he again came through for the Mini-Mafia. Gigas looks=
 down at Razorclaw. (Judging by the size of the Razorclaw figure and the fa=
ct that Gigas is a large, Ultra sized bot, like Depth Charge) Gigas swings =
a huge punch at Razorclaw

                                Razor Claws head=
 snapped back from Gigas' punch.  The punch hurt like hell but Razor Claw w=
ouldn't show pain. The impact caused the Raptor to be knocked back about te=
n feet but he stayed on his feat. He looked back  at the attacker and could=
n't hold back a snarl. "I hope that wasn't your best shot, I'd hate to have=
 to eliminate you in an unfair fight".
                                ----=
- Original Message ----- 
                                From: THECODE 
  =
                              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                     =
           Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 6:13 PM
                       =
         Subject: Re: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three shoul=
d get help.


                                OOC: Hey, Gigas punched at Ra=
zorclaw, post damage...
                                ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
                                From: CYBERWOLF4 
              =
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                                S=
ent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 10:31 AM
                                Su=
bject: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three should get help.


 =
                               Razor Claw saw the three bots leaving the sc=
een of the battle and mistook them for escaping alliance members. he mental=
ly reported his actions to Ice and got the go ahead. He chased the three un=
til they were out of the way of the fight. He transformed to robot mode, pu=
lled his sword and confronted them. "You will stop or you will be forced to=
, your choice."

                                He aproached the three bot=
s ready for battle and hoping that things won't be ended peacefully.
      =
                          ----- Original Message ----- 
                   =
             From: dachande 
                                To: nbwrpg@egr=
oups.com 
                                Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 7=
:40 PM
                                Subject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and R=
amus


                                ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
      =
                           
                                    They had he=
ard the battling and decided to run away, they needed no part in the confli=
ct. Eclipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus as they were leaving, and togthe=
r they exited the base, in beast modes. And headed far away.














=




















        eGroups Sponsor
